alert.note: Alert for Benton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 7:31AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong winds and heavy rain will impact portions of Benton County through 800 AM EST... At 730 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a band of heavy showers producing strong winds extending from 7 miles east of Rossville to 6 miles east of Newport. Movement was north at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boswell around 740 AM EST. Fowler and Earl Park around 745 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Swanington, Dunnington, Ambia, Raub, Templeton and Wadena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
